programme.title: NCIS
programme.desc: An enigmatic killer shoots dead a businessman spending Thanksgiving at a hotel in the city, then takes his glasses, jewellery and ID to Washington Dulles airport, which has been brought to a stand-still by a massive snowstorm. As the murderer's actions take effect, a terror alert is issued, leaving all northern US airports in a state of panic, and leaving it up to DiNozzo, Bishop and her husband - all of whom are trapped at Dulles by the weather - to bring the armed villain to justice. Crime drama, starring Michael Weatherley

programme.title: Law & Order
programme.desc: Part one of two. Best-selling mystery writer PK Todd and her accountant are gunned down outside a restaurant. Miraculously, Todd survives but her companion is mortally wounded, prompting Briscoe and Green to launch a murder inquiry and discover the culprit's real target. However, they soon find themselves mixed up in a deadly case of jealousy and betrayal. Guest starring Ruthie Henshall and Tom Berenger

programme.title: Law & Order
programme.desc: The seemingly straightforward murder of a stockbroker plunges Briscoe and Green into the murky world of insider-trading and blackmail, as they learn that the victim led a seedy double life. However, their investigations take on a new dimension when the suspected killer is himself bumped off by a professional hitman. Jerry Orbach and Jesse L Martin star

programme.title: Law & Order
programme.desc: The murder of a white teenager in Harlem seems like an open-and-shut case - until two patrol officers are implicated in the crime. As tensions between residents and investigating officers mount, the Mayor puts pressure on Schiff to make an example of the cops, hoping it will be enough to satisfy ADA McCoy. Drama, starring Steven Hill

programme.title: Law & Order
programme.desc: Van Buren orders Briscoe and Green to reinvestigate unsolved cases, starting with the murder of a teenager 20 years previously. However, they discover much of the evidence gathered at the time has vanished, and the detective in charge of the case may have pursued an innocent man to protect the real culprit. An unexpected confession allows the case to end up in court again, but legal trickery makes a conviction an unlikely prospect

programme.title: Law & Order
programme.desc: A man with a history of violence is arrested for the murder of his son's school ice-hockey coach, but pleads mitigating circumstances. Helped by a glib defence lawyer, he claims that he committed the crime while suffering from a previously unknown mental condition he calls 'sports rage'

programme.title: Law & Order
programme.desc: Briscoe and Green investigate the discovery of four bodies in a jeweller's shop. Suspicion soon falls on the husband of one of the victims, who is revealed to have changed his identity to escape a shady past. The shop's security tapes are subsequently discovered in his flat, but the defendant surprises everyone by insisting on representing himself in court - and makes a big impression on the jury

programme.title: NCIS
programme.desc: Director Vance charges DiNozzo with a special assignment to go to France, locate Admiral Kendall's wayward daughter Amanda and bring her home. Arriving in Marseille, Tony immediately heads to the local NCIS office, only to find five dead agents. After eventually tracking down Amanda, the pair embark on a rollercoaster ride to the relative safety of the nearest NCIS office in Spain. Michael Weatherly stars

programme.title: NCIS
programme.desc: The death of Special Agent Ned Dorneget hits the team hard, and when Gibbs receives a visit from his late colleague's mother - CIA Officer Joanna Teague - he must decide whether to let her help with the investigation into the Calling. Meanwhile, Gibbs hopes his young charge Luke, formerly one of the Calling's radicalised footsoldiers, might be key to bringing the organisation down. However, when the terrorists discover where their defecting comrade has taken refuge, the abduct him and flee to Iraq. The team follows hot on their heels, but it seems Luke's ties to the Calling might be stronger than anyone at NCIS ever anticipated. Naval crime drama, starring Mark Harmon, with guest Mimi Rogers

programme.title: NCIS
programme.desc: Gibbs fights for his life on board a US Navy hospital ship after being shot. Meanwhile, DiNozzo and Joanna Teague head for Shanghai, where they hope to take down the leaders of the terrorist group known as The Calling. Starring Mark Harmon, Michael Weatherly and Mimi Rogers

programme.title: Blue Bloods
programme.desc: Danny and Jackie are assigned to protect a witness in a major trial involving the Russian Mob. However, their presence does nothing to deter a would-be assassin from making an attempt on her life - and the detectives discover a leak from their department could undermine the entire operation. Meanwhile, Erin is offered an opportunity that could lead to her working even more closely with Frank

programme.title: Law & Order: Special Victims Unit
programme.desc: Benson and Stabler are called to an industrial laundry where an environmental activist has been found raped and murdered, with CCTV footage leading them to a car registered to a man who died nine months previously. The detectives visit his son Jason, who tries to make a break for it with a box containing some very odd items, one of which is linked to the victim. Another artefact leads to a woman who reported being raped back in the 1960s, but she now has Alzheimer's and Benson has to talk to her daughter Vivian. The Crime drama, guest starring Alex Kingston, Maria Bello and R Lee Ermey

programme.title: Law & Order: Special Victims Unit
programme.desc: Benson is visited by FBI agent Dana Lewis, who claims she has been raped while working on an undercover project, but is worried if she reports it to her superiors they would pull her off the case and everything that she had achieved would go to waste. The detective persuades Dana to let her and Stabler investigate and they follow her to a staged protest against the building of a mosque organised by the group she had infiltrated. Guest starring Marcia Gay Harden (Miller's Crossing, Damages)

programme.title: Law & Order: Special Victims Unit
programme.desc: The detectives investigate the rape and murder of Laura Santiago, an animal rights campaigner who had been working on a documentary exposing shocking facts about the meat-processing industry. Her mentor, journalist Jake Bradshaw, tells them certain businesses did not like what she was doing and points them to the location of her last shoot

programme.title: Law & Order: Special Victims Unit
programme.desc: Stabler's former colleague Jo Marlowe (Sharon Stone) joins the SVU as the team's new ADA and questions a fire marshal's version of events after a man is accused of setting a fire in which his two daughters died. Marlowe believes the suspect's claims of innocence and calls in private investigator Iggy Drexel - who comes up with another theory about how the blaze started. Guest starring Brad Dourif (Deadwood)

programme.title: Blue Bloods
programme.desc: An unsolved case from Frank's past resurfaces when a boy's body is discovered at a building site - and he struggles to keep a clear head while searching for the killer. Meanwhile, Danny and Jackie investigate the murder of a call girl, but the seemingly straightforward inquiry becomes far more complicated when the FBI becomes involved. Drama, starring Tom Selleck and Donnie Wahlberg

programme.title: Blue Bloods
programme.desc: Danny and Frank investigate the murder of a Russian mobster's son, but the trail of evidence leads them in circles. Erin takes on a high-profile corruption case, but worries she has only been given the job because of her family ties. Meanwhile, Jamie discovers Joe's former partner has committed suicide. Drama, starring Tom Selleck and Donnie Wahlberg

programme.title: Criminals: Caught on Camera
programme.desc: Journalist Nick Wallis joins police forces around the nation to discover how CCTV and technological advances are helping to bring criminals to justice. The programme reveals how essential surveillance cameras have become in the fight against crime and features footage of people caught red-handed

programme.title: NCIS
programme.desc: McGee deals with his father's recent death by writing him a letter outlining the details of his latest investigation. The case involved tracking down a hactivist collective known as Krampus, who were thought to have been responsible for an incident in which the internet crashed all over Washington, DC. McGee and Abby brought in three known cyber-terrorists for questioning, and discover evidence that links the trio to an attempted breach of the Congress e-mail server and archive. However, when this line of inquiry reaches a dead-end, the team picks up a new lead that suggests an isolated hacker from Wisconsin may be responsible. This 'lone wolf' scenario does not seem plausible to McGee, though, as he recalls a lesson his late father taught him. Crime drama, starring Sean Murray

programme.title: NCIS
programme.desc: The bodies of five people, all of whom are identified as being from the US Navy, are found on the floor of a diner, and all are connected to a suspicious tax firm that specialises in helping people who are in arrears. When further killings are linked to the business, the team realises the crime seem to be copycats of previous cases. Meanwhile, two of Gibbs' ex-wives appear at the location with something important to discuss with the agent. Starring Mark Harmon, Michael Weatherly and Pauley Perrette

programme.title: Entertainment News on 5
programme.desc: Showbiz news and gossip

programme.title: NCIS
programme.desc: American social worker Sarah Goode is taken hostage by militants in northern Syria, and thanks to the efforts of the Navy Seals, is eventually returned home unharmed. Evidence from the incident suggests US citizen Kyle Nasry was connected to the kidnapping, but when the agents trace Nasry to a rally held by a controversial imam, they are surprised to find Sarah among the attendees. Meanwhile, DiNozzo finally takes his relationship with Zoe Keates public - surprising none of his colleagues. Starring Mark Harmon, Michael Weatherly and Pauley Perrette

programme.title: Law & Order
programme.desc: Briscoe and Green investigate the murder of an insurance salesman who sold bogus policies to European Jews during the Second World War and soon discover the victim possessed valuable information about specific policy numbers that could provide a link to the culprit. Jerry Reach and Jesse L Martin star

programme.title: Law & Order
programme.desc: A teacher's body is found in the boot of her car. Suspicions that she was having an affair are soon confirmed, but the case takes a sinister turn when the trail leads to her husband and fanatical father-in-law. Jerry Orbach stars

programme.title: Law & Order
programme.desc: When a wealthy art patron is found murdered and her body mutilated, the team's inquiries lead to failed painter Larry Brunig, who objected to the obscene nature of the art supported and promoted by the victim - and a probe into his past reveals a violent history

programme.title: Law & Order
programme.desc: Animal rights activists are implicated in the death of an Aids researcher killed by a bite from an infected monkey, and use the ensuing court case to drum up support for their cause. As events unfold, McCoy and Carmichael find themselves debating ethics with lawyers who argue the protection of animal life is a valid defence in a murder case

programme.title: Law & Order
programme.desc: A woman's body is found in a Central Park lake during a Puerto Rican Day parade. The victim turns out to be the wife of a powerful billionaire, and pressure is put on the police to find the culprit quickly. Suspicion falls on the business partner of the victim's husband and a witness comes forward to identify him, making everything seem clear cut - but not for long

programme.title: Law & Order
programme.desc: A restaurant owner is beaten to death and Briscoe and Green's investigation leads them to a gang of thrill-seeking teenagers who tried to steal from the victim but ended up killing him. The ensuing case leaves McCoy with a dilemma over whether the accused are old enough to face the death penalty

programme.title: NCIS
programme.desc: Gibbs throws himself back into his work following his near-death experience, updating his appearance and tackling a new risky case alongside DEA agent Luis Mitchell, who wants help bringing down a drugs cartel. Concerned about his colleague's apparent enthusiasm to re-enter the field, DiNozzo discovers Mitchell is the son of a former NCIS agent who gave his life trying to save Gibbs' late wife and daughter, and this attachment is causing Gibbs to break his own rule against personal involvement in a case. However, a significant danger is posed by Benson Long, the cartel's head, and Mitchell's top target

programme.title: NCIS
programme.desc: A US Marine is found murdered in Quantico, mere hours after calling Gibbs to discuss a possible case. In response, Bishop and McGee go undercover as a married couple to run surveillance on a lieutenant and his wife, who may be connected to the death. Starring Mark Harmon, Emily Wickersham and Michael Weatherly

programme.title: NCIS
programme.desc: A young Navy Seaman is found dead, with his eyes gouged out, after being involved in a car accident. Director Vance makes a rare return to field duty, pairing up with Gibbs to investigate when it becomes clear the killing seems to be connected to the case of Kip Klugman, a former NCIS agent he once locked up for stealing evidence. Starring Mark Harmon and Rocky Carroll

programme.title: NCIS
programme.desc: Sarah Porter, the Secretary of the Navy, learns her daughter has been kidnapped, and the NCIS crew teams up with the FBI to track the case, determine a motive and bring the abducted girl home. Meanwhile, McGee's childhood friend, NCIS Special Agent Valerie Page, arrives in town to assist with advanced tactics training. Naval crime drama, guest starring Leslie Hope and Christina Chang

programme.title: Law & Order: Special Victims Unit
programme.desc: As Stabler is waiting to address a Take Back the Night rally at Hudson University, Bethany Jennings accuses fellow student Chuck Mills of raping her and the detective arrests him. ADA Sonya Paxton tells the team that since there is no clear evidence nor any witnesses, it is impossible to establish whether consent was given and Chuck must be released. However, he is soon accused of another crime. Starring Christopher Meloni

programme.title: Law & Order: Special Victims Unit
programme.desc: Cragen orders Benson off a case when the search of a crime scene turns up DNA evidence that Vivian Arliss, the mother of her ward Calvin, was in the house. But Benson decides to ignore his command and secretly continues her quest to locate Vivian, while fighting to keep custody of the boy. Guest starring Maria Bello

programme.title: Law & Order: Special Victims Unit
programme.desc: A criminal performing community service is suspected of murdering a woman in Central Park, but flees before he can be questioned. The detectives track him down to a booby-trapped bunker and manage to apprehend him - but even after he is in custody, the killings continue. Crime drama, guest starring Nick Stahl, with Mariska Hargitay and Christopher Meloni

programme.title: Law & Order: Special Victims Unit
programme.desc: The team investigates the rapes of several teenage girls in Central Park, but rookie cop Brad Fletcher jeopardises the case when he rashly apprehends and attacks a suspect. Marlowe lays into the officer for potentially ruining her case with his actions, but she is stunned when Cragen then informs her NYPD records show nobody by the name of Brad Fletcher in the system

programme.title: Law & Order
programme.desc: A man is found bludgeoned to death in the back seat of a tour bus used by the crew of a film called Babes Being Bad. The detectives suspect that the producer and a colleague took advantage of a woman, leading her to accidentally kill the victim in self-defence. Crime drama, starring Jesse L Martin and Milena Govich

programme.title: Law & Order
programme.desc: The ex-wife of a respected former senator is found murdered in her home, and Green and Cassady's inquiries lead them to a dysfunctional family with a number of strange secrets. programme.title: Murder, She Wrote
programme.desc: Jessica reunites the suspects of a 25-year-old murder case to try to put an end to the mystery once and for all - but the exercise leads to more grim consequences. Crime drama, starring Angela Lansbury, with Donald O'Connor and Anne Francis

programme.title: Murder, She Wrote
programme.desc: Maggie McCauley, Jessica's former student and now the producer of a TV police show, gets involved in a heated argument with the network programmer who is planning to cancel the series. programme.title: Murder, She Wrote
programme.desc: Jessica comes to the aid of old friend and New York police officer James O'Malley, who is investigating a suicide he believes was actually a murder. Starring Angela Lansbury

programme.title: Murder, She Wrote
programme.desc: A former jewel thief and Jessica's friend Dennis Stanton spends a romantic evening with a woman, only to find himself the prime suspect in a puzzling murder. A coin collector is found dead and the sleuth must try to prevent an injustice being done. Keith Michell guest stars, with Angela Lansbury and Dina Merrill

programme.title: Murder, She Wrote
programme.desc: Jessica is invited to her cousin's wedding, but the groom is murdered well before he reaches 'till death us do part'. The amateur sleuth immediately sets out to unmask the culprit and wonders whether the gruesome event could be linked to the release of the bride's brother from a psychiatric institution. Angela Lansbury stars

programme.title: Murder, She Wrote
programme.desc: Jessica's nephew Grady and his pregnant wife Donna agree to house-sit for the mystery-solving author while she is out of town, and are shocked when they wake one night to discover the body of an amputee in her living room. Whodunit, starring Angela Lansbury

programme.title: Murder, She Wrote
programme.desc: After a great many successful investigations, Jessica Fletcher takes a back seat for this episode, bringing her old British MI6 agent friend Michael Haggerty to the fore as he travels to Sicily and looks into a bizarre case of a double and triple-cross involving the widow of a Mafia gangster

programme.title: Murder, She Wrote
programme.desc: First part of the pilot episode of the whodunit series, starring Angela Lansbury as a widow with a penchant for solving crimes. Jessica Fletcher is invited to a costume party where a private investigator dressed as Sherlock Holmes is found dead in the swimming pool - and her nephew Grady becomes the prime suspect in the case

programme.title: Murder, She Wrote
programme.desc: Conclusion of the two-part pilot episode, in which Jessica Fletcher continues her investigation into the mystery surrounding the death of a party guest dressed as Sherlock Holmes, found floating in her publisher's swimming pool. Angela Lansbury stars

programme.title: Murder, She Wrote
programme.desc: Four sisters claim their father died on a boat trip during a storm, but with their stories changing constantly, Jessica's suspicions grow and she tries to ascertain whether they are guilty of killing him to benefit from a $100million inheritance. Drama, starring Angela Lansbury, Tom Bosley and Howard Duff

programme.title: Murder, She Wrote
programme.desc: Jessica travels to San Francisco for her niece's wedding, but finds herself trying to prove the groom innocent of murder when he is accused of killing his boss, who had been refusing to pay him. Drama, starring Angela Lansbury, Jeff Conaway and Martin Landau

programme.title: La Brea
programme.desc: Eve, Levi and Ty return to the mysterious fort despite their near-death experience there in the hopes they might share their 10,000 BC survival skills

programme.title: La Brea
programme.desc: When a stunning revelation puts Josh and Izzy's lives on the line, Eve and the other survivors desperately search for the young boy who holds the key to saving them

programme.title: La Brea
programme.desc: A massive sinkhole opens in the middle of Los Angeles and hundreds of people, vehicles and buildings are pulled into its depths, with the survivors finding themselves trapped in a mysterious and dangerous primeval land Sci-fi mystery, starring Natalie Zea and Eoin Macken

programme.title: Criminal Minds
programme.desc: Part two of two. Reid is kidnapped and tortured by the serial killer, and his ordeal is broadcast on the internet, where it is witnessed by Hotchner, Gideon and the team. His troubled childhood is also revealed in a series of flashbacks as he drifts in and out of consciousness

programme.desc: Part two of two. Reid is kidnapped and tortured by the serial killer, and his ordeal is broadcast on the internet, where it is witnessed by Hotchner, Gideon and the team. His troubled childhood is also revealed in a series of flashbacks as he drifts in and out of consciousness

programme.title: Motorway Patrol
programme.desc: Documentary following members of the New Zealand highway patrol as they witness some of the best and worst behaviour on the nation's motorways. The series is centred around the roads of Auckland, the country's largest urban area, and features motoring chaos including major traffic collisions, escaped animals and pedestrians on busy roads. There is also footage of drivers falling asleep at the wheel, overloaded vehicles and suspects caught with illegal substances - plus a host of excuses as the people pulled over try to persuade officers they have not done anything wrong

programme.title: Monkey Life

programme.title: Wildlife ER

programme.title: Patrick Aryee's Wild World

programme.title: Road Wars
programme.desc: The Proactive Squad from Thames Valley Police use unmarked cars fitted with on-board video cameras to give an insight into vehicle crime and how it can be prevented, featuring footage of dangerous drivers on the overcrowded roads

programme.title: Road Wars

programme.title: Strike Back

Meanwhile, Scott has a heart-to-heart with his errant son Finn

programme.title: Prodigal Son
programme.desc: Malcolm gets his dream interview opportunity when the NYPD zeroes in on one of his and Martin's favourite psychologists, who may be involved in a murder linked to an LSD-laced psychology trial. Meanwhile, as his night terrors continue to evolve, Malcolm checks in with his trusted childhood therapist to discuss new theories on what exactly he witnessed as a child

programme.title: For Life

programme.title: Mark of a Serial Killer

programme.desc: The story of allied intelligence agents who've discovered aliens on Earth who are bent on taking over the world. In response, the agents form a top-secret multinational agency, The Global Alliance

programme.title: Legend of the Dragon
programme.desc: The guardian of the temple has passed on and a new Golden Dragon must be Chosen from a brother and sister - Twins born in the Year of the Dragon. Only one will be chosen. Their sibling bond tested

programme.title: Dork Hunters from Outer Space
programme.desc: Alien Dorks disguise themselves as humans to use Earth as a base to take over the universe, but they face opposition from some unlikely teenage heroes

programme.title: Extreme Dinosaurs
programme.desc: 65 Million years ago, Dinosaurs disappeared. Now they're Back! T-Bone, Spike, Bullzeye, and Stegz. Four prehistoric dinosaurs, evolved into intelligent beings reawaken in a bizarre new world

programme.title: Stone Age
programme.desc: Meet a group of typical suburban nine-year-old kids with friends, foes and families kicking it really old school, in prehistoric times

programme.title: Stone Age
programme.desc: Meet a group of typical suburban nine-year-old kids with friends, foes and families kicking it really old school, in prehistoric times

programme.title: Kong: The Animated Series
programme.desc: Kong, Jason, jungle girl Lua, fun-loving Tann and wise Dr. Jenkins take on power-hungry scientists, ferocious prehistoric creatures and incredible magical beings to protect their unique island home

programme.title: The Baron
programme.desc: Mannering travels to Rome to investigate the death of an airline steward with a gold medallion in his possession. Sylvia Syms guest stars in the final episode

programme.title: Pet Island
programme.desc: A day in the life of glamour queen Taylor-Rae and her beloved Pekingese Coco. In Cork, Gillian prepares her dogs Nero and Arthur for the arrival of a new baby and in Belfast naughty Chihuahuas visit the vet

programme.title: Wild Britain with Ray Mears
programme.desc: The survival expert explores the nutrient-rich waters around the Isle of Mull in the Inner Hebrides. There, he goes whale watching with local skipper James Fairburns, and comes face to face with the world's second-largest fish. Back on dry land, he observes an otter hunting along the coast, and meets David Sexton - the island's RSPB officer - to examine a white-tailed eagle nesting site

programme.title: The World's Most Extraordinary Families
programme.desc: What exactly makes a family in today's often complex world? Each episode features three unique families from around the world who live their lives in a less than conventional way

programme.title: William and Mary
programme.desc: As Rick and Molly's wedding approaches, the girls enjoy a wild hen night surrounded by booze and naked men. But as the party gets into full swing, Mary makes a shocking announcement - she's three months' pregnant. William is delighted with the news, but has enough to worry about when the firm is asked to conduct its first Chinese funeral, complete with fireworks. Meanwhile, Kate and Brendan try to slip away together for a night of passion - but next door's rampant rabbit Baldrick soon throws a spanner in the works. Starring Martin Clunes, Julie Graham, Michael Begley and Cheryl Campbell

programme.title: The Whisperers (1967)
programme.desc: A lonely old woman becomes consumed by her belief that imaginary creatures are spying on her. Meanwhile, her duplicitous husband and her no-good son hatch a plan to steal her life savings - but when she becomes wise to their schemes, she struggles to convince others to believe her. Drama, starring Edith Evans, Eric Portman and Ronald Fraser

programme.title: The Weak and the Wicked (1954)
programme.desc: The inmates of a women's jail struggle to put their lives back together. Drama, starring Glynis Johns and Diana Dors

programme.title: The Brittas Empire
programme.desc: Following a spate of thefts, Gordon hides in the ladies' changing room in a bid to catch whoever is responsible. A stressed Helen urges Gordon to accompany her to the doctor, so he tasks Colin with replacing him on surveillance duties. Comedy, starring Chris Barrie

programme.title: Secrets of London with Mark Monroe
programme.desc: The London transport museum, But not the one in Covent garden

programme.title: London Live News
programme.desc: News weather events and the best of the capital's culture. Join us to explore life in London

programme.title: Sara Dane
programme.desc: Historical drama about a woman transported to a penal colony in Australia for a crime she did not commit

programme.title: Hitler's Bodyguard
programme.desc: How the Stauffenberg bomb missed Hitler by inches. Documentary investigating how the German leader managed to escape assassination several times thanks to his handpicked bodyguards

programme.title: Vita & Virginia (2019)
programme.desc: Biopic romance about the life of Virginia Woolf and her passionate love affair with fellow author Vita Sackville-West. The pair meet in London in the 1920s and, despite both of them being married, they embark on an affair that later inspired one of Virginia's novels. Gemma Arterton and Elizabeth Debicki star in the title roles, along with Rupert Penry-Jones and Isabella Rossellini

programme.title: Her Private Hell (1968)
programme.desc: An Italian woman comes to London to seek her fortune, but is seduced into a seedy world of nude modelling. Drama, starring Lucia Modugno and Terence Skelton

programme.title: London Districts
programme.desc: Short visual tours exploring and revealing lesser known areas of London for locals and tourists. Narrated by Dewyne Lindsay

programme.title: Secrets of London with Mark Monroe
programme.desc: London cabbie Mark Munroe takes you to the hidden and more quirky parts of this amazing city that normally lie undiscovered

programme.title: The Thick of It
programme.desc: A database containing the immigration records of more than 170,000 people is accidentally erased, and Nicola and her staff try to keep the news from Malcolm. The minister also has to get through a lunch with journalists without revealing the catastrophic scale of this latest computer disaster - especially as speculation about her future has already begun. Political comedy, starring Rebecca Front and Peter Capaldi. From October 2009

programme.title: Regina: The First Woman Rabbi
programme.desc: Documentary about Regina Jonas, who made history when she became the first officially ordained female rabbi in 1935. Through personal correspondence and newspaper articles she left behind, this film tells her story, from her upbringing in Berlin as the daughter of an Orthodox Jewish peddler, through her studies to her ordination. Featuring Rachel Weisz as the voice of Regina

programme.title: News Rewind
programme.desc: A digest of news and events from across London from the past few days

programme.title: Talking Points
programme.desc: Current affairs affecting Londoners today and a look at the latest shows and films in the capital

programme.title: William and Mary

Drama, starring Martin Clunes and Julie Graham

programme.desc: Drama, starring Mel Smith as a property developer who manipulates and negotiates his way through local politics in a midlands town. Originally broadcast in 1982

programme.desc: The actress travels from Newcastle to Edinburgh by high speed train. When she reaches her destination, she discovers the connection between the railway and the famous Balmoral Hotel

Korean War drama, with Richard Widmark and Richard Basehart

programme.title: The World of Henry Orient (1964)
